title: 1v1 Tourney Rules
body: Can someone tell me what the average General 1v1 Tourney Rules are. Like bans. Or Blind pick.

replies.body:
Not sure if there's a standard ruleset for 1v1s, but the way we've done it at past All-Star tournaments has been like this:

**Champ Select**: Blind Draft (3 bans like Draft Mode, then players pick their champions like Blind Pick).
**Win Conditions**: First player to take a tower, OR reach 100 CS OR kill the opposing champion.

No restrictions on item choices or going back.
Mid lane only (no going into jungle or past lane's side brush)
